protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for a C-C type chemokine. Binds to MIP-3- alpha/LARC and subsequently transduces a signal by increasing the intracellular calcium ions level

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway

reference.reference_text: Baba M, Imai T, Nishimura M, Kakizaki M, Takagi S, Hieshima K, Nomiyama H, Yoshie O: Identification of CCR6, the specific receptor for a novel lymphocyte-directed CC chemokine LARC. J Biol Chem. 1997 Jun 6;272(23):14893-8.
Zaballos A, Varona R, Gutierrez J, Lind P, Marquez G: Molecular cloning and RNA expression of two new human chemokine receptor-like genes. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1996 Oct 23;227(3):846-53.
Liao F, Lee HH, Farber JM: Cloning of STRL22, a new human gene encoding a G-protein-coupled receptor related to chemokine receptors and located on chromosome 6q27. Genomics. 1997 Feb 15;40(1):175-80.
